Package me.wobblyyyy.pathfinder.core

Class ZoneGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.wobblyyyy.pathfinder.core.ZoneGenerator
  • public class ZoneGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    Used in generating new field zones to prevent any potential collisions between the robot and the field.

    For reference, the order things are done in here is as follows.

    • Any potential 2dRobot instances are removed.
    • The zones are first assessed on whether or not they're collidable objects.
    • The zones are sorted into two categories - circles and rectangles.
    • Circles are given a radius that is 9 inches larger than the current radius.
    • Rectangles are given lengths that are 4.5 inches longer on all sides.
    • These new shapes are given zones.
    • These zones are stored and now available for access.
    • Clean up excess shit.

    Author:
    Colin Robertson

      • ZoneGenerator

        public ZoneGenerator​(java.util.ArrayList<Zone> originalZones,
                     double robotWidth,
                     double robotHeight)
        Create a new zone generator, thus generating a bunch of zones.
        Parameters:
        originalZones - the list of original zones. The new zones should be based on this list.
        robotWidth - the width of the robot (in inches).
        robotHeight - the height of the robot (in inches).
